speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: In Troy, there lies the scene. From isles of Greece

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: The princes orgulous, their high blood chafed,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Have to the port of Athens sent their ships,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Fraught with the ministers and instruments

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Of cruel war: sixty and nine, that wore

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Their crownets regal, from the Athenian bay

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Put forth toward Phrygia; and their vow is made

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: To ransack Troy, within whose strong immures

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: The ravish'd Helen, Menelaus' queen,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: With wanton Paris sleeps; and that's the quarrel.

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: To Tenedos they come;

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: And the deep-drawing barks do there disgorge

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Their warlike fraughtage: now on Dardan plains

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: The fresh and yet unbruised Greeks do pitch

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Their brave pavilions: Priam's six-gated city,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Dardan, and Tymbria, Helias, Chetas, Troien,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: And Antenorides, with massy staples

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: And corresponsive and fulfilling bolts,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Sperr up the sons of Troy.

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Now expectation, tickling skittish spirits,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: On one and other side, Trojan and Greek,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Sets all on hazard: and hither am I come

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: A prologue arm'd, but not in confidence

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Of author's pen or actor's voice, but suited

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: In like conditions as our argument,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: To tell you, fair beholders, that our play

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Leaps o'er the vaunt and firstlings of those broils,

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Beginning in the middle, starting thence away

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: To what may be digested in a play.

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Like or find fault; do as your pleasures are:

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Now good or bad, 'tis but the chance of war.

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: SCENE I. Troy. Before Priam's palace.

speaker: LUCIUS
text_entry: Enter TROILUS armed, and PANDARUS
